_sText:
Omega changes:
Removed that train to 1. Bossfight. Was to buggy after certain css updates. Instead its just a teleporter now
Plz Post if you found more bugs especialy after updates plz inform me
Add a guide how to beat Ragnara and Sephiroth


Anti Stall:
if someone enters a secret nade room. you have 40 sec to get the nade or the room will get disabled means all inside will die. After the first player enters the a secred nade room: Teleport gets disabled after 20 sec

after 120sec: a fire tornade spawns scorching through the map and kills all that touch it. Secret nade rooms get disabled too.
If someone goes to 1. Boss and dont enter the Warp to boss. He automatic die in 20 sec

This is just to prevent from noobs that want destroy your server by stalling and camping at save locations
